name: HTMLCanvasElement.height
description: The HTMLCanvasElement.height property is a positive integer reflecting the height HTML attribute of the canvas element interpreted in CSS pixels. When the attribute is not specified, or if it is set to an invalid value, like a negative, the default value of 150 is used.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLCanvasElement.height' in HTML Living Standard.
